DOC.brief_title: DANish Study Optimal Acute Treatment Patients With ST-elevation Myocardial Infarction
DOC.criteria: Age ≥ 18 year . Acute onset chest pain < 12 hour ' duration . STsegment elevation ≥ 0.1 mV ≥ 2 contiguous lead , sign true posterior infarction document newly develop leave bundle branch block . Culprit lesion major native vessel . Pregnancy . Known intolerance ASA , clopidogrel , heparin contrast . Inability understand information provide inform consent . Haemorrhagic diathesis know coagulopathy . Stent thrombosis .
